response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a rate that reflects its true worth while offering you a significant discount compared to the market value of $15,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.", "product_price": 12000}
